result.markdown:
--- title: "2024 Japanese Men's Gymnastics Olympic Team" author: "Dante Yasui" date: "2024/07/11" format: html: df-print: kable toc: true --- # Data Results from: ::: {.cell} ```{#lst-data .r .cell-code} library(tidyverse) allJA_df <- read_csv("./AllJapan_results.csv") nhkJA_df <- read_csv("./NHK_results.csv") results_df <- bind_rows(list(allJA_df, nhkJA_df)) %>% select(!Total) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{#lst-eventdist .r .cell-code lst-cap="plot of event distributions"} library(ggthemes) eventsdist <- results_df %>% select(!AA) %>% pivot_longer( cols = c(FX, PH, SR, VT, PB, HB), names_to = "Event", values_to = "Score", ) %>% filter(Score > 1) %>% ggplot(aes(x=Score)) + geom_density() + xlim(11, 16) + facet_wrap(~Event, ncol = 2) + theme_pander() eventsdist ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning: Removed 8 rows containing non-finite outside the scale range (`stat_density()`). ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output-display} ![national distributions of scores on each event](TeamJapan_files/figure-html/fig-eventdist-1.png){#fig-eventdist width=672} ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{#lst-aadist .r .cell-code lst-cap="plot of all-around distribution"} aadist <- results_df %>% select(AA) %>% ggplot(aes(x=AA)) + geom_density() + xlim(70, 90) + theme_pander() aadist ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning: Removed 108 rows containing non-finite outside the scale range (`stat_density()`). ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output-display} ![national distributions of all-around scores](TeamJapan_files/figure-html/fig-aadist-1.png){#fig-aadist width=672} ::: ::: ::: {#tbl-averagescores .cell tbl-cap='Individuals\' average scores across nhk and all-japan championships'} ```{.r .cell-code} team_japan <- c("Hashimoto Daiki", "Oka Shinnosuke", "Kaya Kazuma", "Sugino Takaaki", "Tanigawa Wataru") # average individual gymnasts' scores across four days averages_df <- results_df %>% filter(NAME %in% team_japan) %>% # on olympic team group_by(NAME) %>% summarise_at(vars(FX:AA), mean, na.rm=TRUE) %>% arrange(desc(AA)) averages_df ``` ::: {.cell-output-display}
|NAME | FX| PH| SR| VT| PB| HB| AA| |:---------------|--------:|--------:|--------:|--------:|--------:|--------:|--------:| |Hashimoto Daiki | 14.65000| 15.04950| 14.13300| 15.00000| 14.79950| 14.45000| 88.08200| |Oka Shinnosuke | 14.40825| 13.58300| 14.39125| 14.19975| 14.69975| 14.39975| 85.68175| |Kaya Kazuma | 13.59125| 14.56650| 14.14975| 14.39975| 14.79125| 13.85800| 85.35650| |Sugino Takaaki | 14.21650| 14.70000| 12.93300| 14.66650| 13.62475| 14.82450| 84.96525| |Tanigawa Wataru | 13.79975| 13.21625| 14.45800| 14.93300| 14.93300| 12.55800| 83.89800|
::: ::: ::: {.cell} ::: ## Event scores breakdown ::: {#tbl-teamevents .cell tbl-cap='Team Japan expected event scores'} ```{#lst-actualteam .r .cell-code lst-cap="team_top_scores() of actual team picks"} actual_team <- team_top_scores(team_japan) actual_team_tot <- actual_team %>% team_total() actual_team %>% kableExtra::kable() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} |Event | Score|OnEvent | |:-----|--------:|:------------------------------------------------| |FX | 43.27475|Hashimoto Daiki, Oka Shinnosuke , Sugino Takaaki | |HB | 43.67425|Sugino Takaaki , Hashimoto Daiki, Oka Shinnosuke | |PB | 44.52375|Tanigawa Wataru, Hashimoto Daiki, Kaya Kazuma | |PH | 44.31600|Hashimoto Daiki, Sugino Takaaki , Kaya Kazuma | |SR | 42.99900|Tanigawa Wataru, Oka Shinnosuke , Kaya Kazuma | |VT | 44.59950|Hashimoto Daiki, Tanigawa Wataru, Sugino Takaaki | ::: ::: Expected Team Score : 263.38725
